meta.article_title: October 6, 2014 - Should You Play Tournaments When Working on Something New?

should_you_play_tournaments_when_working.probleme: Should I play tournaments when working on new techniques?

debutant.description: Practice until reflexive use in matches; don't re-enforce old habits.

exercices_complementaires.description: Use new technique in match situations to reinforce learning; avoid re-enforcing old habits.

metriques_progression.description: Use in match situations most of the time; don't just perfect, also reinforce under pressure.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Playing matches too early while still working on new techniques can re-enforce bad habits.
